column1: Sergei Avdeyev (?????? ?????????? ??????, born 1 January 1956) is a Russian engineer and cosmonaut.
Avdeyev was born in Chapayevsk, Samara Oblast (formerly Kuybyshev Oblast), Russian SFSR.
He graduated from Moscow Physics-Engineering Institute in 1979 as an engineer-physicist.

column2: From 1979 to 1987 he worked as an engineer for NPO Energiya.

column1: He was selected as a cosmonaut as part of the Energia Engineer Group 9 on 26 March 1987.

column2: His basic cosmonaut training was from December 1987 through to July 1989.

column1: He retired as a cosmonaut on 14 February 2003.
He has orbited the earth 11,968 times traveling about 515,000,000 kilometers.
In August 2005, this record was taken by another cosmonaut, Sergei K. Krikalev.
Avdeyev is married with two children.
He is an amateur radio operator, and his call sign is RV3DW.
For a long time, Avdeyev held the record for time dilation experienced by a human being.

column2: This is due to the special relativistic effect of time dilation and is not properly thought of as time travelling as described by mainstream culture.
